an4.169:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo diṭṭheva dhamme sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:1.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kāyassa bhedā sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo diṭṭheva dhamme asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kāyassa bhedā asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo diṭṭheva dhamme sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti?
an4.169:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhānupassī kāye viharati, āhāre paṭikūlasaññī, sabbaloke anabhiratisaññī, sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassī.
an4.169:2.3: Maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṃ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an4.169:2.4: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.169:2.8: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ adhimattattā diṭṭheva dhamme sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:2.9: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo diṭṭheva dhamme sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo kāyassa bhedā sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti?
an4.169:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhānupassī kāye viharati, āhāre paṭikūlasaññī, sabbaloke anabhiratisaññī, sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassī.
an4.169:3.3: Maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṃ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an4.169:3.4: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.169:3.8: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ muduttā kāyassa bhedā sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:3.9: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo kāyassa bhedā sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo diṭṭheva dhamme asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti?
an4.169:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ …pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ …pe… tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an4.169:4.3: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.169:4.7: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ adhimattattā diṭṭheva dhamme asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:4.8: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo diṭṭheva dhamme asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo kāyassa bhedā asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti?
an4.169:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ …pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ …pe… tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an4.169:5.3: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4.169:5.6: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ muduttā kāyassa bhedā asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:5.7: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo kāyassa bhedā asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti.
an4.169:5.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
